ComicInfo.Penciller: Ron Wilson,Russ Heath,Bernie Krigstein,Mike Sekowsky,Allen Bellman,Bernie Krigstein,Mike Sekowsky,Allen Bellman,Russ Heath
ComicInfo.Title: Ghouls in the Graveyard; The Hands of Murder; Vampire Brats; The Brain!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ghouls in the Graveyard: A man makes a deal with ghouls in order to be spared.
The Hands of Murder: A young woman fears that her late sister has come back from the grave to kill her.
Vampire Brats: A nurse gets a job at an infants' home where all the babies seem just a little different.
The Brain!: A warped Nazi scientist, sentenced to death, has an assistant dig up his body, remove his head and keep it alive in his laboratory. He makes plans for world domination.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
